gameCard.inviteCodeTooltip: Players recieve a link that allows them to join the game in their email. If the player loses their link, share this link to them.

preGameInfo.useHeadphones: If possible, use headphones to avoid bothering other players with your game audio.
preGameInfo.canSilence: You can mute a player if there is too much background noice.

browserAlert.title: The service might not work properly with your browser
browserAlert.info: If the connection fails, try using another browser. You can see the supported browsers

preGameInfo.waiting: Waiting for the host to start the game...

spectator.limited: The amount of spectators is limited
